thread.title: Sethu is a character close to my heart: Bala
thread.title_full: Sethu is a character close to my heart: Bala - The Times of India

author: Sanjith Sidhardhan
title: Sethu is a character close to my heart: Bala
text:
Bala's role as Sethu in Ennu Ninte Moideen could very well turn a new page for the actor in Mollywood. The actor, who has had a lean phase of sorts, proved his mettle with the role, which he terms as his "most challenging".
"Sethu is someone who is caught between Moideen, who was his best friend, and Kanchanamala, who is his sister," says the actor. "There was a fine line that I couldn't cross and that's why it's a role that is close to my heart."
Bala says he's overwhelmed by the reaction the movie has got. "The entire film took 120 days to shoot and it's my first Malayalam movie after a break. The fact that the audience loved the movie and the reception I have got for my role has given me a lot of confidence," he says.
The actor will next be seen in Mohanlal's Pulimurugan , in which he will be playing a prominent character.
